Reviews.Title: FAKE!!!
Reviews.Author: F. Calabrese
Reviews.Content: It is made of cardboard. Not plastic as stated. False advertizing.!!! Terrible product. I am returning it. It cost cents to make and it is sold for almost $7 dollars. rip off.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, airsprayed cardboard
Reviews.Author: ssamdy45
Reviews.Content: Someone air sprayed some out of focus paint on a cheap piece of white cardboard. My kid could do a better job.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Latoya MG
Reviews.Content: Nothing special. The size was smaller than expected and the ink seemed a little ligh on some of the wording. For a short term fix its ok.

Reviews.Title: Avocado thieves
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: cheaply made for the price, I have been battling avo thieves for a long time.  I hope this works - the thieves won't care how poorly this is made.

Reviews.Title: Dislike of item
Reviews.Author: Alex Burgos
Reviews.Content: I gave it a two star rating because 1) it was very expensive 2) the material will not last on the exterior of a home and 3) I found a metal version of the sigh in Home Depot for less than $3.00!!!

Reviews.Title: Not for outdoor use
Reviews.Author: Jr
Reviews.Content: Not really a plastic sign like you would purchase at a hardware store . It is  more along the lines of a plastic sprayed or coated  corrugated cardboard. Picture seemed  deceiving  to me and probably would not have purchased if I had seen it on a shelf in a store.

Reviews.Title: warning security sign.
Reviews.Author: Juan Herrera
Reviews.Content: yes it worg good! and the best thing is that is in english and spanish.it call the attention to any one passing by the house.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video Surveillance System
For CCTV Security Camera
Security
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 9 x 11 inches Warning Security Sign for CCTV Security Camera Video Surveillance System
